headings.text: Your Brand Deserves Better Than Template Navigation

paragraphs:
PAOLO MASCATELLI | AIPHLO: Live build
            ▼
My site is an example of the Custom AIPHLO Navigation Systems in development (showcasing my work as part portfolio). Use the site wide "Phantom Nav" and galleries within for the secondary Phantom Nav
Film | DSLR | Mirrorless
not for public use
High-end luxury platform-agnostic UX/UI augmentation for open-source platforms. Built for boutique brands who refuse to look basic.

assets.alt: A black background with white outlined text and an intricate crest. The large text says 'TENEBRÉ' at the top. The crest features two winged lions facing each other, a shield with ornate detailing, and a banner below reading 'TENEBRÉ'. Under the crest, small text reads 'LOS ANGELES EST. 2025'.
Graffiti-style tag inside a heart outline

NeStylized digital artwork of Angela canoe as She from the Netflix Series, with a red face mask, black and white  ornate clothing with red and black accents, featuring a symmetrical composition, abstract background elements, drawn by Paolo Mascatelli

paragraphs: PAOLO MASCATELLI | AIPHLO: Live build

modern geometric | light brutalism
